text: James Howard Thome (born on August 27, 1970) is a former professional baseball player. Thome played 22 seasons from 1991 to 2012. In the past, he played for the Cleveland Indians, the Philadelphia Phillies, Chicago White Sox, and the LA Dodgers. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:American baseball players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:National League All-Stars
title: Jim Thome
